The user instantaneously teleports in front of the opponent and hits them with their shakujō coated in lightning.

== Trivia ==
* In ''[[Naruto Shippūden: Ultimate Ninja Storm 4]]'', Madara only teleports in front of the opponent, while in ''[[Naruto x Boruto: Ultimate Ninja Storm Connections]]'', he follows up with an attack.
